## TSBufferOptions.customTypes property

Append `CustomTypeSchema` to given schema, to customize validate &amp; encode methods for specific types. For example 'mongodb/ObjectId'.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
customTypes?: {
        [schemaId: string]: CustomTypeSchema;
    };
```
